Welcome

Contact me if you'd like me to do a custom order for you~including if you'd like me to use the printed fabric on both sides of your pillow cover when this is not provided in the listing you are considering.

I can make pillow covers in most any size and with most any fabric, including one that you provide.

Payment

I accept checks, money orders and Paypal. Note that Paypal accepts credit cards and debit cards even if you do not have an account with them.

Shipping

Note that item(s) will ship via USPS with tracking numbers and delivery confirmation. Packages over 13 ounces ship via USPS Priority Mail.

I process all of my orders as quickly as possible. They generally ship within 7 days of your payment-sometimes faster and sometimes slower, depending upon availability. If you need a rush shipment, message me and I will try my best to make it happen.

Returns and Exchanges

RETURNS: I DO NOT offer returns or exchanges because it is important to me that my customers receive items which came directly from my smoke-free and pet-free studio.

However, depending on the circumstances, I will do all I can to make you happy with your purchase.

CONTACT ME DIRECTLY WITH ANY CONCERNS REGARDING YOUR ORDER
